tool.name: ERPairFinder
tool.description: Util which can be used to evaluate pair ratios on enhanced resolution (zoom) scans.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir pair_in && ln -s '$pair_in' 'pair_in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $pair_in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($pair_in.ext)' && mkdir out && #if "feature_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir feature_out && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -pair_in 'pair_in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $pair_in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($pair_in.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("consensusxml")}' #if "feature_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -feature_out 'feature_out/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' #end if #if len(str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',')) == 0 | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("consensusxml")}' '$out' #if "feature_out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'feature_out/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' '$feature_out' #end if #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: in
param.label: Input mzML file containing the ER spectra

param.name: pair_in
param.label: Pair-file in the format: m/z-light m/z-heavy charge rt

param.name: precursor_mass_tolerance
param.label: Precursor mass tolerance which is used for the pair finding and the matching of the given pair m/z values to the features

param.name: RT_tolerance
param.label: Maximal deviation in RT dimension in seconds a feature can have when comparing to the RT values given in the pair file

param.name: max_charge
param.label: Maximal charge state features should be search fo

param.name: intensity_threshold
param.label: Intensity threshold, for the meaning see the documentation of the IsotopeWaveletFeatureFinder documentation

param.name: max_isotope
param.label: Max isotope of the isotope distribution to be considered

param.name: expansion_range
param.label: The range that is used to extend the isotope distribution with null intensity peaks in Th

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
param.label: Optional outputs
param.option: feature_out (Output featureXML file, only written if given, skipped otherwise)

data.name: feature_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: feature_out
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "feature_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Util which can be used to evaluate pair ratios on enhanced resolution (zoom) scans.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.6.0/html/UTILS_ERPairFinder.html
